title: Roger Corman | Ski Troop Attack (1960) Colorized | Action, War | Full Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Roger Corman | Ski Troop Attack (1960) Colorized | Action, War | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
They Turned a White Hell Red with Enemy Blood!
An American patrol has to cross behind enemy lines by skis in order to blow up an important railroad bridge. The task is made harder by conflicts between the platoon's veteran sergeant and its inexperienced lieutenant .

Original title: Ski Troop Attack (1960)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/gBwevIlZIyw

Director: Roger Corman
Writer: Charles B. Griffith
Stars: Michael Forest, Frank Wolff, Wally Campo 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Action, Adventure, War

Movie review: https://letterboxd.com/cultcinemaclass/film/ski-troop-attack/
